content: In which U.S. state can you find Mount Rushmore, featuring the carved faces of four American presidents: George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt, and Abraham Lincoln?

Mount Rushmore is located in the Black Hills region of South Dakota. The monument features the sculpted faces of four prominent American presidents: George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt, and Abraham Lincoln. This iconic attraction was created by Danish-American sculptor Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, over a period of 14 years, from 1927 to 1941. It attracts millions of visitors each year who come to admire the colossal sculptures and learn about the history of these influential leaders.
